verses.arabic: ٱقْتَرَبَ لِلنَّاسِ حِسَابُهُمْ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.english: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
verses.hausa: Hisãbin mutãne ya kusanta gare su, ahãli kuwa sunã a cikin gafala, sunã mãsu bijirẽwa.

verses.arabic: مَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّن رَّبِّهِم مُّحْدَثٍ إِلَّا ٱسْتَمَعُوهُ وَهُمْ يَلْعَبُونَ
verses.english: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play
verses.hausa: Wani ambatõ daga Ubangijinsu sãbo, bã ya zuwa gare su fãce sun saurãre shi, alhãli kuwa sunã mãsu yin wãsa.

verses.arabic: لَاهِيَةً قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّجْوَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ هَلْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُكُمْ ۖ أَفَتَأْتُونَ ٱلسِّحْرَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.english: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"
verses.hausa: Sanã mãsu shagaltacin zukãtansu, kuma su asirta gãnãwa: Waɗanda suka yi zãlunce (sunã cẽwa) "Wannan bã Kõwa ba ne fãce mutum misãlinku. Shin, to, kunã jẽ wa sihiri, ahãli kuwa kũ, kunã fahimta?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّى يَعْلَمُ ٱلْقَوْلَ فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ubangijina Yanã sanin magana a cikin sama da ƙasa kuma Shi ne Mai ji, Masani."

verses.arabic: بَلْ قَالُوٓا۟ أَضْغَـٰثُ أَحْلَـٰمٍۭ بَلِ ٱفْتَرَىٰهُ بَلْ هُوَ شَاعِرٌ فَلْيَأْتِنَا بِـَٔايَةٍ كَمَآ أُرْسِلَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
verses.english: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."
verses.hausa: Ã'a, suka ce: "Yãye-yãyen mafarki ne. Ã'a, yã ƙirƙira shi ne. Ã'a, shi mawãƙi ne. Sai ya zo mana da wata ãyã kamar yadda aka aiko manzanni na farko."

verses.arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتْ قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ ۖ أَفَهُمْ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
verses.hausa: Wata alƙarya da Muka halaka ta a gabãninsu, ba ta yi ĩmãni ba. Shin, to, sũ, sunã yin ĩmãni?

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا قَبْلَكَ إِلَّا رِجَالًا نُّوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِمْ ۖ فَسْـَٔلُوٓا۟ أَهْلَ ٱلذِّكْرِ إِن كُنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu aika ba a gabãninka fãce mazãje, Munã yin wahayi zuwa gare su. Ku tambayi ma'abũta ambato idan kun kasance ba ku sani ba.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ جَسَدًا لَّا يَأْكُلُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ خَـٰلِدِينَ
verses.english: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu sanya su jiki, bã su cin abin ci ba, kuma ba su kasance madawwama ba.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْوَعْدَ فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهْلَكْنَا ٱلْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.english: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma Muka gaskata musu alkawari; sai Muka tsẽrar da su da wanda Muke so, kuma Muka halakar da mãsu yawaitãwa.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكُمْ كِتَـٰبًا فِيهِ ذِكْرُكُمْ ۖ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
verses.hausa: Lalle haƙĩƙa Mun saukar da wani littãfi zuwa gare ku, a cikinsa akwai ambatonku. Shin, to, bã ku hankalta?

verses.arabic: وَكَمْ قَصَمْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ كَانَتْ ظَالِمَةً وَأَنشَأْنَا بَعْدَهَا قَوْمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
verses.english: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.
verses.hausa: Kuma da yawa Muka karya wata alƙarya tã kasance mai zãlunci, kuma Muka ƙãga halittar waɗansu mutãne na dabam a bãyanta.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّوا۟ بَأْسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنْهَا يَرْكُضُونَ
verses.english: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
verses.hausa: Sai a lõkacin da suka hangi azãbarMu, sai gã su sunã gudu daga gare ta.

verses.arabic: لَا تَرْكُضُوا۟ وَٱرْجِعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَآ أُتْرِفْتُمْ فِيهِ وَمَسَـٰكِنِكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُسْـَٔلُونَ
verses.english: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."
verses.hausa: "Kada ku yi gudu. Ku kõmo zuwa ga abin da aka ni'imtar da ku a cikinsa da gidãjenku tsammãninku anã tambayar ku."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Kaitonmu! Lalle mũ ne muka kasance mãsu zãlunci."

verses.arabic: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلْكَ دَعْوَىٰهُمْ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ حَصِيدًا خَـٰمِدِينَ
verses.english: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan waccan ba ta gushe ba, ita ce da'awarsu har Muka mayar da su girbabbu, bitattu.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَـٰعِبِينَ
verses.english: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu halitta sama da ƙasa da abin da ke a tsakãninsu Muna Mãsu wãsã ba.

verses.arabic: لَوْ أَرَدْنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهْوًا لَّٱتَّخَذْنَـٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.english: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
verses.hausa: Da Mun yi nufin Mu riƙi wani abin wãsa dã Mun riƙe shi daga gunMu, idan Mun kasance mãsu aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: بَلْ نَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَى ٱلْبَـٰطِلِ فَيَدْمَغُهُۥ فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِقٌ ۚ وَلَكُمُ ٱلْوَيْلُ مِمَّا تَصِفُونَ
verses.english: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, Munã jĩfa da gaskiya a kan ƙarya, sai ta darkãke ta, sai ga tã halakakka. Kuma bone yã tabbata a gare ku sabõda abin da kuke siffantãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ وَمَنْ عِندَهُۥ لَا يَسْتَكْبِرُونَ عَنْ عِبَادَتِهِۦ وَلَا يَسْتَحْسِرُونَ
verses.english: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
verses.hausa: Kuma shĩ ne da mallakar wanda yake a cikin sammai da ƙasa. Kuma waɗanda suke wurinSa (watau malã'iku), bã su yin girman kai ga ibãdarSa. kuma bã su gajiya.

verses.arabic: يُسَبِّحُونَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ لَا يَفْتُرُونَ
verses.english: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
verses.hausa: Sunã tasbĩhi dare da rãnã, bã su yin rauni.

verses.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَةً مِّنَ ٱلْأَرْضِ هُمْ يُنشِرُونَ
verses.english: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
verses.hausa: Kõ (kãfirai) sun riƙi waɗansu abũbuwan bautãwa ne ga ƙasã, su ne mãsu tãyarwa (gare su)?

verses.arabic: لَوْ كَانَ فِيهِمَآ ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَا ۚ فَسُبْحَـٰنَ ٱللَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَرْشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
verses.english: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
verses.hausa: Dã waɗansu abũbuwan bautawa sun kasance a cikinsu (sama da ƙasa) fãce Allah, haƙĩƙa dã su biyun sun ɓãci. Sabõda haka tsarki ya tabbata ga Allah Ubangijin Al'arshi daga abin da suke siffantãwa.

verses.arabic: لَا يُسْـَٔلُ عَمَّا يَفْعَلُ وَهُمْ يُسْـَٔلُونَ
verses.english: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
verses.hausa: Bã a tambayar Sa ga abin da Yake aikatãwa, alhãli kuwa sũanã tambayar su.

verses.arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً ۖ قُلْ هَاتُوا۟ بُرْهَـٰنَكُمْ ۖ هَـٰذَا ذِكْرُ مَن مَّعِىَ وَذِكْرُ مَن قَبْلِى ۗ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ فَهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.english: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
verses.hausa: Kõ sun riƙi waɗansu abũbuwan bautãwa baicinSa? Ka ce: "Ku kãwo hujjarku, wannan shi ne ambaton wanda yake tãre da ni, kuma shi ne ambaton wanda yake a gabãnĩna. Ã'a, mafi yawansubã su sanin gaskiya, sabõda haka sũ mãsu bijirẽwa ne."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوحِىٓ إِلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنَا۠ فَٱعْبُدُونِ
verses.english: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu aiki wani Manzo ba a gabãninka fãce Munã yin wahayi zuwa gare shi, cẽwa "Lalle ne Shi, bãbu abin bautãwa fãce Nĩ, sai ku bauta Mini."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًا ۗ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ ۚ بَلْ عِبَادٌ مُّكْرَمُونَ
verses.english: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Mai rahama ya riƙi ɗã." Tsarkinsa, ya tabbata! Ã'a, (malã'iku) bãyi ne mãsu daraja.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْبِقُونَهُۥ بِٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُم بِأَمْرِهِۦ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
verses.hausa: Bã su gabãtarSa da magana, kuma su da umurninSa suke aiki.

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يَشْفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ ٱرْتَضَىٰ وَهُم مِّنْ خَشْيَتِهِۦ مُشْفِقُونَ
verses.english: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.
verses.hausa: Yanã sanin abin da yake gaba gare su da abin da yake a bãyansu, kuma bã su yin cẽto fãce ga wanda Ya yarda, kuma sũmasu sauna ne sabõda tsõronSa.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَقُلْ مِنْهُمْ إِنِّىٓ إِلَـٰهٌ مِّن دُونِهِۦ فَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِيهِ جَهَنَّمَ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya ce daga gare su, "Lalle nĩ abin bautãwa ne baicinSa," to, wannan Munã sãkã masa da, Jahannama. Kamar haka Muke sãkã wa azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ كَانَتَا رَتْقًا فَفَتَقْنَـٰهُمَا ۖ وَجَعَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلْمَآءِ كُلَّ شَىْءٍ حَىٍّ ۖ أَفَلَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?
verses.hausa: Shin kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta ba, su gani da cẽwa lalle sammai da ƙasa sun kasance ɗinke, sai Muka bũɗe su, kuma Muka sanya dukan kome mai rai daga ruwa? Shin, bã zã su yi ĩmãni ba?

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ رَوَٰسِىَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِهِمْ وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا فِجَاجًا سُبُلًا لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.english: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.
verses.hausa: Kuma Mun sanya tabbatattun duwãtsu a cikin ƙasa dõmin kada ta karkata da su kuma Mun sanya ranguna, hanyõyi, a cikinsu (duwãtsun), tsammãninsu sunã shiryuwa.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ سَقْفًا مَّحْفُوظًا ۖ وَهُمْ عَنْ ءَايَـٰتِهَا مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.english: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.
verses.hausa: Kuma Mun sanya sama rufi tsararre, alhãli kuwa su daga ãyõyinta mãsu bijirẽwa ne.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ ٱلَّيْلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ فِى فَلَكٍ يَسْبَحُونَ
verses.english: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.
verses.hausa: Kuma shĩ ne wanda Ya halitta dare da yini da rãnã da watã dukansu a cikin wani sarari suKe iyo.

verses.arabic: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا لِبَشَرٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ ٱلْخُلْدَ ۖ أَفَإِي۟ن مِّتَّ فَهُمُ ٱلْخَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu sanya dawwama ga wani mutum ba, a gabãninka. Shin to idan ka mutu to sũ ne madawwama?

verses.arabic: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۗ وَنَبْلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلْخَيْرِ فِتْنَةً ۖ وَإِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
verses.hausa: Kõwane rai mai ɗanɗanar mutuwa ne. Kuma Munã jarraba ku da sharri da alhẽri dõmin fitina. Kuma zuwa gare Mu ake mayar da ku.

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِن يَتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى يَذْكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ وَهُم بِذِكْرِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ هُمْ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Kuma idan waɗanda suka kãfirta suka gan ka, bã su riƙon ka fãce da izgili (sunã cẽwa), "Shin, wannan ne ke ambatar gumãkanku?" Alhãli kuwa sũ, ga ambatar Mai rahama, mãsu kãfirta ne.

verses.arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ مِنْ عَجَلٍ ۚ سَأُو۟رِيكُمْ ءَايَـٰتِى فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونِ
verses.english: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
verses.hausa: An halitta mutum daga gaggãwa, zan nũna muku ãyõyiNa. Sabõda haka kada ku nẽmiyin gaggãwa.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
verses.hausa: Kuma sunã cẽwa, "A yaushe wannan wa'adi zai tabbata, idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya?"

verses.arabic: لَوْ يَعْلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ حِينَ لَا يَكُفُّونَ عَن وُجُوهِهِمُ ٱلنَّارَ وَلَا عَن ظُهُورِهِمْ وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.english: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...
verses.hausa: Dã waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã sanin lõkacin da bã su kange wuta daga fuskõkinsu, kuma haka daga bãyayyakinsu, alhãli kuwa ba su zama ana taimakon su ba.

verses.arabic: بَلْ تَأْتِيهِم بَغْتَةً فَتَبْهَتُهُمْ فَلَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمْ يُنظَرُونَ
verses.english: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, tanã jẽ musu bisa ga auke sai ta ɗimautar da su, sa'an nan bã su iya mayar da ita, kuma ba su zama anã yi musu jinkiri ba.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدِ ٱسْتُهْزِئَ بِرُسُلٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ فَحَاقَ بِٱلَّذِينَ سَخِرُوا۟ مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, an yi izgili ga waɗansu Manzanni daga gabãninka, sai abin da suka kasance sunã izgili da shi ya auku ga waɗanda suka yi izgilin daga gare su.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن يَكْلَؤُكُم بِٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ مِنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۗ بَلْ هُمْ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّهِم مُّعْرِضُونَ
verses.english: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Wãne ne yake tsare ku a dare da yini daga Mai rahama?" Ã'a, sũ mãsu bijirẽwa ne daga ambaton Ubangijinsu.

verses.arabic: أَمْ لَهُمْ ءَالِهَةٌ تَمْنَعُهُم مِّن دُونِنَا ۚ لَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ نَصْرَ أَنفُسِهِمْ وَلَا هُم مِّنَّا يُصْحَبُونَ
verses.english: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.
verses.hausa: Ko kuwa sunã da waɗansu abũbuwan bautãwa waɗanda ke tsare su, daga gare Mu? Bã su iya taimakon kansu kuma ba su kasance anã abũtar su ba daga gareMu.

verses.arabic: بَلْ مَتَّعْنَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمْ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلْعُمُرُ ۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوْنَ أَنَّا نَأْتِى ٱلْأَرْضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنْ أَطْرَافِهَآ ۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلْغَـٰلِبُونَ
verses.english: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
verses.hausa: Ã'a, Mun yalwata wa waɗannan da ubanninsu ni'imarMu, har rãyuwa ta yi tsawo a kansu. Shin, to, bã su ganin cẽwa lalle Mũ, Munã je wa ƙasarsu, Munã rage ta daga sãsanninta? Shin, to, su ne marinjaya?

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أُنذِرُكُم بِٱلْوَحْىِ ۚ وَلَا يَسْمَعُ ٱلصُّمُّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا مَا يُنذَرُونَ
verses.english: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Abin sani, inã yi muku gargaɗi kawai da wahayi," kuma kurma ba ya jin kira a lõkacin da ake yi musu gargaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتْهُمْ نَفْحَةٌ مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Kuma haƙĩƙa idan wata iska daga azãbar Ubangiji ta shãfe su, haƙĩƙa sunã cẽwa, "Yã kaitonmu! Lalle mũ ne muka kasance mãsu zãlunci."

verses.arabic: وَنَضَعُ ٱلْمَوَٰزِينَ ٱلْقِسْطَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَلَا تُظْلَمُ نَفْسٌ شَيْـًٔا ۖ وَإِن كَانَ مِثْقَالَ حَبَّةٍ مِّنْ خَرْدَلٍ أَتَيْنَا بِهَا ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَـٰسِبِينَ
verses.english: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.
verses.hausa: Kuma Munã aza ma'aunan ãdalci ga Rãnar ¡iyãma, sabõda haka ba a zãluntar rai da kõme. Kuma kõ dã ya kasance nauyin ƙwãya daga kõmayya ne Mun zo da ita. Kuma Mun isa zama Mãsu hisãbi.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَـٰرُونَ ٱلْفُرْقَانَ وَضِيَآءً وَذِكْرًا لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.english: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, Mun kãwo wa Mũsã da Hãrũna Rarrabewa da haske da ambato ga mãsu aiki da taƙawa.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشْفِقُونَ
verses.english: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke tsãron Ubangijinsu a fake, alhãli kuwa sũ, mãsu sauna ne daga Sa'a.

verses.arabic: وَهَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ ۚ أَفَأَنتُمْ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
verses.english: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
verses.hausa: Kuma wannan ambato ne mai albarka Mun saukar da shi. Shin, to, kũ mãsu musu ne gare shi?

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ رُشْدَهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle haƙĩƙa Mun kãwo wa Ibrãhĩm shiryuwarsa daga gabãni, kuma Mun kasance Masana gare shi.

verses.arabic: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِۦ مَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلتَّمَاثِيلُ ٱلَّتِىٓ أَنتُمْ لَهَا عَـٰكِفُونَ
verses.english: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce wa ubansa da mutanensa, "Mẽne ne waɗannan mutummutumai waɗanda kuke mãsu lazimta a kansu?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ وَجَدْنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا لَهَا عَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.english: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Mun sãmi Ubanninmu mãsu lazimta a kansu."

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَقَدْ كُنتُمْ أَنتُمْ وَءَابَآؤُكُمْ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle, haƙĩƙa, kun kasance kũ da Ubanninku a cikin ɓata bayyananna."

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَجِئْتَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ أَمْ أَنتَ مِنَ ٱللَّـٰعِبِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Shin kã zo mana da gaskiya ne, Kõ kuwa kai kanã daga mãSu wãsã ne?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَل رَّبُّكُمْ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّذِى فَطَرَهُنَّ وَأَنَا۠ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
verses.english: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ã'a, Ubangijinku Shi ne Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa, wanda Ya ƙãga halittarsu. Kuma Ni inã daga mãsu shaida a kan haka."

verses.arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصْنَـٰمَكُم بَعْدَ أَن تُوَلُّوا۟ مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.english: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
verses.hausa: "Kuma inã rantsuwa da Allah, lalle zan yi wani shiri ga gumãkanku a bãyan kun jũya kunã mãsu bãyar da bãya."

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمْ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرًا لَّهُمْ لَعَلَّهُمْ إِلَيْهِ يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.english: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
verses.hausa: Sai ya sanya su guntu-guntu fãce wani babba gare su, tsammãninsũ sunã Kõmãwa zuwa gare shi.

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ مَن فَعَلَ هَـٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَآ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Wane ne ya aikata wannan ga gumãkanmu? Lalle shĩ, haƙĩƙa, yanã daga azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سَمِعْنَا فَتًى يَذْكُرُهُمْ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ
verses.english: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Mun ji wani saurayi yanã ambatar su. Anã ce masa Ibrahĩm."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ فَأْتُوا۟ بِهِۦ عَلَىٰٓ أَعْيُنِ ٱلنَّاسِ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَشْهَدُونَ
verses.english: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "To, ku zo da shi a kan idanun mutãne, tsammãnin su zã su bãyar da shaida."

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ ءَأَنتَ فَعَلْتَ هَـٰذَا بِـَٔالِهَتِنَا يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ
verses.english: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Shin kai ne ka aikata wannan ga gumãkanmu? Yã Ibrahĩm!"

verses.arabic: قَالَ بَلْ فَعَلَهُۥ كَبِيرُهُمْ هَـٰذَا فَسْـَٔلُوهُمْ إِن كَانُوا۟ يَنطِقُونَ
verses.english: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ã'a, babbansu, wannan, shĩ ya aikata, shi. Sai ku tambaye su idan sun kasance sunã yin magana."

verses.arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمْ فَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّكُمْ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.english: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Sai suka kõma wa jũnansu suka ce: "Lalle ne kũ, kũ ne azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُوا۟ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمْ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ
verses.english: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan kuma aka sunkuyar da su a kan kãwunansu (sukace,) "Lalle, haƙĩƙa, kã sani waɗannan bã su yin magana."

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمْ
verses.english: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Shin to, kunã bautã wa abin da, bã ya, amfãnin ku da Kõme kuma bã ya cũtar da ku baicin Allah?"

verses.arabic: أُفٍّ لَّكُمْ وَلِمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
verses.hausa: "Tir da ku, kuma da abin da kuke bauta wa, baicin Allah! Shin to, bã ku hankalta?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ حَرِّقُوهُ وَٱنصُرُوٓا۟ ءَالِهَتَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ku ƙõne shi kuma ku taimaki gumãkanku, idan kun kasance mãsu aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: قُلْنَا يَـٰنَارُ كُونِى بَرْدًا وَسَلَـٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.english: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
verses.hausa: Muka ce: "Yã wuta! Ki kasance sanyi da aminci ga Ibrahĩm."

verses.arabic: وَأَرَادُوا۟ بِهِۦ كَيْدًا فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْأَخْسَرِينَ
verses.english: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka yi nufin wani mũgun shiri da shi, sai Mukasanya su mafiya hasãra.

verses.arabic: وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا لِلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka tsẽrar da shi da Lũɗu zuwa ga ƙasar nan wadda Muka sanya albarka a cikinta ga tãlikai.

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ نَافِلَةً ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا صَـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka ba shi Is'haka da Ya'aƙuba a kan daɗi alhãli kuwa dukansu Mun sanya su sãlihai.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَئِمَّةً يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا وَأَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ فِعْلَ ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِ ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا عَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.english: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka sanya su shugabanni, sunã shiryarwa da umurninMu. Kuma Muka yi wahayi zuwa gare su da ayyukan alhẽri da tsayar da salla da bãyar da zakka. Kuma sun kasance mãsu bauta gare Mu.

verses.arabic: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ٱلَّتِى كَانَت تَّعْمَلُ ٱلْخَبَـٰٓئِثَ ۗ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍ فَـٰسِقِينَ
verses.english: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
verses.hausa: Kuma Lũɗu Mun bã shi hukunci da ilmi. Kuma Mun tsĩrar da shi daga alƙaryar nan wadda ke aikata mũnãnan ayyuka. Lallesũ, sun kasance mutãnen mũgun aiki, fãsiƙai.

verses.arabic: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka shigar da shi a cikin rahamarMu. Lalle ne shĩ, yanã daga sãlihai.

verses.arabic: وَنُوحًا إِذْ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ وَأَهْلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْكَرْبِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
verses.english: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
verses.hausa: Kuma Nũhu, a sa'ad da ya yi kira a gabãni, sai Muka karɓa masa, sa'an nan Muka tsirar da shi da mutãnensa daga baƙin ciki mai girma.

verses.arabic: وَنَصَرْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمَ سَوْءٍ فَأَغْرَقْنَـٰهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka taimake shi daga mutãnen nan waɗanda suka ƙaryata da ãyõyinMu. Lalle ne sũ, sun kasance mutãnen mugun aiki. Sai Muka nutsar da su gabã ɗaya.

verses.arabic: وَدَاوُۥدَ وَسُلَيْمَـٰنَ إِذْ يَحْكُمَانِ فِى ٱلْحَرْثِ إِذْ نَفَشَتْ فِيهِ غَنَمُ ٱلْقَوْمِ وَكُنَّا لِحُكْمِهِمْ شَـٰهِدِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
verses.hausa: Kuma Dãwũda da Sulaimãn sa'ad da suke yin hukunci a cikin sha'anin shũka a lõkacin da tumãkin mutãne suka yi kiĩwon dare a cikinsa. Kuma Mun kasance Mãsu halarta ga hukuncinsu.

verses.arabic: فَفَهَّمْنَـٰهَا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ وَكُلًّا ءَاتَيْنَا حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا ۚ وَسَخَّرْنَا مَعَ دَاوُۥدَ ٱلْجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحْنَ وَٱلطَّيْرَ ۚ وَكُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.english: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
verses.hausa: Sai Muka fahimtar da ita (mats'alar) ga Sulaiman. Kuma dukansu Mun bã su hukunci da ilmi kuma Muka hõre duwatsu tãre da Dãwũda, sunã tasbĩhi, da tsuntsãye. Kuma Mun kasance Mãsu aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَعَلَّمْنَـٰهُ صَنْعَةَ لَبُوسٍ لَّكُمْ لِتُحْصِنَكُم مِّنۢ بَأْسِكُمْ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُمْ شَـٰكِرُونَ
verses.english: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka sanar da shi sana'ar wata tufa sabõda ku dõmin ya tsare ku daga makãminku. To, shin, ku mãsu gõdẽwa ne?

verses.arabic: وَلِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةً تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا ۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
verses.hausa: Kuma (Muka hõre) wa Sulaimãn iska mai tsananin bugãwa, tanã gudãna da umuruinsa zuwa ga ƙasar nan wadda Muka sanya albarka a cikinta. Kuma Mun kasance Masana ga dukkan Kõme.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعْمَلُونَ عَمَلًا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمْ حَـٰفِظِينَ
verses.english: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
verses.hausa: Kuma daga Shaiɗannu (Mun hõre) wanda ke nutso sabõda shi. Kuma sunã yin wani aiki baicin wancan. Kuma Mun kasance Mãsu tsaro a gare su.

verses.arabic: وَأَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
verses.hausa: Kuma da Ayyũba a sã'ad da ya yi kiran Ubangijinsa, (ya ce:) "Lalle nĩ, cũta ta shãfe ni, alhãli kuwa Kai ne Mafi rahamar mãsu rahama."

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ فَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِۦ مِن ضُرٍّ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنْ عِندِنَا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِلْعَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.english: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
verses.hausa: Sai Muka karɓa masa, sa'an nan Muka kuranye abin da ke a gare shi na cũta, kuma Muka kãwo masa mutãnesa da kwatank wacinsu tãre da su, sabõda rahama daga wurinMu da tunãtarwa ga mãsu ibãda.

verses.arabic: وَإِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَإِدْرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ كُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
verses.hausa: Kuma da Ismãĩla da Idrĩsa da Zulkifli, dukansu sunã daga mãsu haƙuri.

verses.arabic: وَأَدْخَلْنَـٰهُمْ فِى رَحْمَتِنَآ ۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka shigar da su a cikin rahamarMu. Lalle ne, sunã daga sãlihai.

verses.arabic: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَـٰضِبًا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِى ٱلظُّلُمَـٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ إِنِّى كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Kuma mai kifi a sã'ad da ya tafi yanã mai hushi, sai ya yi zaton cẽwa ba zã Mu ƙuƙunta masa ba. Sai ya yi kira a cikin duffai cẽwa, "Bãbu abĩn bautãwa fãce Kai. Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Ka. Lalle ne nĩ, na kasance daga azzãlumai."

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلْغَمِّ ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُـۨجِى ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka karɓa masa kuma Muka tsĩrar da shi daga baƙin ciki. Kamar haka ne Muke tsĩrarda masu ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرْنِى فَرْدًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ ٱلْوَٰرِثِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
verses.hausa: Kuma da Zakariyya a sa'ad da ya kirãyi Ubangijinsa cẽwa, "Ya Ubangiji! Kada Ka bar ni makaɗaici alhãli kuwa Kai ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu gãdo."

verses.arabic: فَٱسْتَجَبْنَا لَهُۥ وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ وَأَصْلَحْنَا لَهُۥ زَوْجَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ يُسَـٰرِعُونَ فِى ٱلْخَيْرَٰتِ وَيَدْعُونَنَا رَغَبًا وَرَهَبًا ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ لَنَا خَـٰشِعِينَ
verses.english: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka karɓa masa kuma Muka kyautata masa mãtarsa. Lalle ne sũ, sun kasance sunã gudun tsẽre zuwa ga ayyukan alhẽri. Kuma sunã kiran Mu a kan kwaɗayi da fargaba. Kuma sun kasance mãsu saunar (aikata sãɓo) gare Mu.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّتِىٓ أَحْصَنَتْ فَرْجَهَا فَنَفَخْنَا فِيهَا مِن رُّوحِنَا وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَا وَٱبْنَهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma da wadda ta tsare farJinta daga alfãsha. Sai Muka hũra a cikinta daga rũhinMu. Kuma Muka sanya ta ita da ɗanta wata ãyã ga dũniya.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أُمَّتُكُمْ أُمَّةً وَٰحِدَةً وَأَنَا۠ رَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُونِ
verses.english: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne wannan ita ce al'ummarku ta zama al'umma guda, kuma Nĩ ne Ubangijinku. Sai ku bauta Mini.

verses.arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓا۟ أَمْرَهُم بَيْنَهُمْ ۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيْنَا رَٰجِعُونَ
verses.english: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
verses.hausa: Kuma suka kakkãtse al'amarinsu a tsakaninsu. Dukan Kõwanensu mãsu Kõmõwa zuwa gare Ni

verses.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤْمِنٌ فَلَا كُفْرَانَ لِسَعْيِهِۦ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ كَـٰتِبُونَ
verses.english: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
verses.hausa: Dõmin wanda ya aikata daga ayyukan kwarai alhãli kuwa yanã mai ĩmãni, to, bãbu musu ga aikinsa, kuma Mu Mãsu rubũtãwa gare shi ne.

verses.arabic: وَحَرَٰمٌ عَلَىٰ قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَآ أَنَّهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.english: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
verses.hausa: Kuma hananne ne a kan wata alƙarya da Muka halakar cẽwa lalle sũ, bã su kõmõwa.

verses.arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُتِحَتْ يَأْجُوجُ وَمَأْجُوجُ وَهُم مِّن كُلِّ حَدَبٍ يَنسِلُونَ
verses.english: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
verses.hausa: Har sa'ad da aka bũde Yãjũju da Mãjũju alhãli kuwa sunã gaggãwa daga kõwane tudun ƙasa.

verses.arabic: وَٱقْتَرَبَ ٱلْوَعْدُ ٱلْحَقُّ فَإِذَا هِىَ شَـٰخِصَةٌ أَبْصَـٰرُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ يَـٰوَيْلَنَا قَدْ كُنَّا فِى غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَـٰذَا بَلْ كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Kuma wa'adin nan tabbatacce ya kusanto, sai gã ta idãnun waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã bayyanannu, (sunã cẽwa), "Yã kaitonmu! Haƙĩƙa mun kasance a cikin gafala daga wannan! Ã'a, mun kasance dai mãsu zãlunci!"

verses.arabic: إِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمْ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
verses.hausa: (A ce musu) "Lalle ne, kũ da abin da kuke bautãwa, baicin Allah makãmashin Jahannama ne. Kũ mãsu tusgãwa gare ta ne."

verses.arabic: لَوْ كَانَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةً مَّا وَرَدُوهَا ۖ وَكُلٌّ فِيهَا خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
verses.hausa: Dã waɗannan (abũbuwanbautãwar) sun kasance abũbuwan bautãwar gaskiya ne, dã ba su tusga mata ba, alhãli kuwa dukansu madawwama a cikinta ne.

verses.arabic: لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَهُمْ فِيهَا لَا يَسْمَعُونَ
verses.english: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
verses.hausa: Sunã da wata hargõwa a cikinta, alhãli kuwa sũ, a cikinta, bã su saurãren kõme.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ سَبَقَتْ لَهُم مِّنَّا ٱلْحُسْنَىٰٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَنْهَا مُبْعَدُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne waɗanda kalmar yabo tã gabãta a garẽ su daga garẽ Mu, waɗannan waɗanda ake nĩsantarwa daga barinta ne.

verses.arabic: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَا ۖ وَهُمْ فِى مَا ٱشْتَهَتْ أَنفُسُهُمْ خَـٰلِدُونَ
verses.english: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
verses.hausa: Bã su jin sautin mõtsinta alhãli kuwa sũ madawwamãne a cikin abin da rãyukansu suka yi marmarinsa.

verses.arabic: لَا يَحْزُنُهُمُ ٱلْفَزَعُ ٱلْأَكْبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ هَـٰذَا يَوْمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِى كُنتُمْ تُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -
verses.hausa: Firgitar nan mafi girma, bã zã ta baƙantã musu rai ba. Kuma malã'iku na yi musu marãba (sunã cẽwa) "Wannan yininku nẽ wanda kuka kasance anã yi muku wa'adi da shi."

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ نَطْوِى ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَطَىِّ ٱلسِّجِلِّ لِلْكُتُبِ ۚ كَمَا بَدَأْنَآ أَوَّلَ خَلْقٍ نُّعِيدُهُۥ ۚ وَعْدًا عَلَيْنَآ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.english: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.
verses.hausa: A rãnar da Muke naɗe sãma kamar neɗẽwar takarda ga abũbuwan rubũtãwa kamar yadda Muka fãra a farKon halitta Muke mãyar da ita. Wa'adi ne a Kanmu. Lalle ne Mun kasance Mãsu aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَتَبْنَا فِى ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلذِّكْرِ أَنَّ ٱلْأَرْضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِىَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ
verses.english: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle haƙĩƙa Mun rubũta a cikin Littãfi baicin Ambato (Lauhul Mahfũz) cẽwa ƙasã, bayĩNa sãlihai, sunã gãdonta.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى هَـٰذَا لَبَلَـٰغًا لِّقَوْمٍ عَـٰبِدِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wannan (Alƙur'ãni), haƙĩƙa, akwai iyarwa (ga maganar da ta gabãta ga waɗansu mutãne mãsu ibãda.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu aike ka ba fãce dõmin wata rahama ga talikai.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ ۖ فَهَلْ أَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
verses.english: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Abin sani kawai, anã yin wahayi zuwa gare ni ne, cẽwa, lalle ne, Abin bautãwarku, Abin bautãwa ne Guda. To shin kũ mãsu mĩƙa wuya ne?"

verses.arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُلْ ءَاذَنتُكُمْ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٍ ۖ وَإِنْ أَدْرِىٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٌ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ
verses.english: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan idan suka jũya, to, ka ce: "Nã sanar da ku, a kan daidaita, kuma ban sani ba, shin, abin da ake yi muku wa'adi makusanci ne Kõ kuwa manĩsanci?"

verses.arabic: إِنَّهُۥ يَعْلَمُ ٱلْجَهْرَ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَكْتُمُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne Shĩ (Allah) Yanã sanin bayyane daga magana, kuma Yanã sanin abin da kuke ɓõyẽwa.

verses.arabic: وَإِنْ أَدْرِى لَعَلَّهُۥ فِتْنَةٌ لَّكُمْ وَمَتَـٰعٌ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
verses.english: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ban sani ba, tsammãninsa ya zama fitina a gare ku, kõ kuma don jin dãɗi, zuwa ga wani ɗan lõkaci."

verses.arabic: قَـٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحْكُم بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
verses.english: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangiji! Ka yi hukunci da gaskiya. Kuma Ubangijinmu Mai rahama ne Wanda ake nẽman taimakonSa a kan abinda kuke siffantãwa."
